Text.Page:
I keep overhearing things. They're saying the arachnens have something to do with the awful plague in Frontera.

If you search their lab and find the answer, maybe we'll be able to go home.

I don't want to raise my daughter in this horrible place!
Maybe someone can get some answers from this, and we can go home again.
We need to know what the arachnens were doing. Bring back everything you can from the lab.
